==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=气}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|气|米|c1=p|c2=s|t2=rice|ls=psc}} – to give rice as a gift.

Later borrowed meanings of “air, flow” from {{och-l|气}}. The derivative {{och-l|餼}} refers to the original word. Compare {{och-l|乞}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[air]]; [[gas]]
#: {{zh-x|天然氣|natural gas}}
#: {{zh-x|出去 透 透氣！|Go out to breathe fresh '''air'''!}}
#: {{zh-x|輪胎 漏 氣 了。|The tire is leaking '''gas'''.}}
# [[breath]]
#: {{zh-x|喘不過氣 來|to be out of '''breath'''}}
#: {{zh-x|我 會 戰鬥 到 最后 一 口 氣。|I will fight to my last '''breath'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|Chinese philosophy}} [[qi]]; vital energy; [[life force]]
# [[smell]]; [[odour]]
#: {{zh-x|氣味|smell}}
#: {{zh-x|把 廚炊 的 煙火 氣 從 衣服 上 去掉 是 很 難 的。|It is difficult to remove the '''smell''' of cooking from clothes.}}
# [[weather]]
#: {{zh-x|天氣|weather}}
# to get [[angry]]
#: {{zh-x|生氣|to get angry}}
# to make [[angry]], to [[annoy]]
#: {{zh-x|別 氣 我！|Don't '''annoy''' me!}}
# to [[breathe]]
# {{rfdef|zh}} <!-- -ness; quality? -->
#: {{zh-x|有 男人 氣|manly}}
